text: Amund Rasmussen Skarholt Amund Rasmussen Skarholt (31 March 1892 - 28 April 1956) was a Norwegian politician for the Norwegian Labour Party. He was born in Orkdal. He was elected to the Norwegian Parliament from Sør-Trøndelag in 1934, and was re-elected on four occasions. During his fifth term, he died and was replaced by Jenny Lund. Skarholt was a member of Orkdal municipality council between 1919 and 1951, serving most of the time as a member of the executive committee. ==References== * Category:1892 births Category:1956 deaths Category:Labour Party (Norway) politicians Category:Members of the Storting Category:20th-century Norwegian politicians
title: Amund Rasmussen Skarholt
